commits.message:
EUCA-13163 - Unable to run instances of types with more than 1 CPU

Description:
 - With qemu versions newer than 2.5, the number of vcpus and topology must match.
 - We currently set sockets, cores, threads to the number of vcpus

Changes:
 - XSLT change to set sockets = 1, threads = 1, and cores to the vcpus

Testing:
 - Verifed that instances with more than 1 CPU could be launched
